newsitem.title: CHINA: China says time right for Taiwan talks.
newsitem.headline: China says time right for Taiwan talks.

text.p: China has said it was time for political talks with Taiwan and that the rival island should take practical steps towards that goal.

Consultations should be held to set the time and format of the talks, the official Xinhua news agency quoted Tang Shubei, executive vice chairman of the Association for Relations Across the Taiwan Straits, as saying late on Wednesday.
